short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate short links and QR codes for the current page
short.zh_CN: 为当前页面生成短链接和二维码

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick Link Generator: Create Short Links and QR Codes Instantly
Share effortlessly, connect efficiently! Our Chrome extension offers instant short link and QR code generation at your fingertips. With just one click, transform the current page into a concise short link and get its corresponding QR code. Whether for social media sharing, professional presentations, or personal use, we make your link distribution more convenient and effective. Simple, fast, and reliable, take your online sharing experience to the next level!
Key Features:

One-click generation of short links and QR codes
Clean interface, intuitive operation
Completely free, no registration required
Multi-language support

Install now and experience a new way of sharing!
long.zh_CN:
快速链接生成器：一键创建短链接和二维码
轻松分享，高效连接！我们的 Chrome 扩展为您提供即时的短链接和二维码生成服务。只需点击一下，即可将当前页面转换为简洁的短链接，同时获得相应的二维码。无论是社交媒体分享、专业演示还是个人使用，我们都能让您的链接传播更加便捷高效。简单、快速、可靠，让您的在线分享体验更上一层楼！
主要特点：

一键生成短链接和二维码
界面简洁，操作直观
完全免费，无需注册
支持多语言

立即安装，体验分享的新方式！
